name: Prenatal Care
description: From family planning through pregnancy care, Potrero Hill Health Center programs are designed to support you. Free pregnancy health care (pregnancy tests, prenatal counseling, prenatal care, and abortion services) regardless of income, insurance coverage, or immigration status. When you visit the clinic, the staff will help start Medi-Cal that same day. Access Public Health Nurse Home Visit Program for pre- and post-partum.

howToGetIt: Enroll in the SF Health Network at https://www.sf.gov/sign-get-care-san-francisco-health-network or call: Patient Access Enrollment Office 628-206-7800 Monday to Friday 8 am to noon 1 to 5 pm Call the clinic for an appointment 415-682-1740
cost: These services are paid for by Presumptive Eligibility (PE). PE is a short term Medi-Cal program for women and teens who think they may be pregnant or are pregnant. If you are not pregnant and would like family planning services you can sign up for Family PACT.
